title: Sports for elementary: playing basketball
creator_credit: Cinema Education, Gilbert George Klevens and Gregory Valtierra
brief_description: Demonstrates the skills and techniques necessary for playing basketball. Covers passing, catching, dribbling, pivoting, and shooting. Suitable for primary level.
